transform_def.name: designed29
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan((p_in.x + p_in.y) + sign(p_in.x - p_in.y)) t = tan((p_in.x - p_in.y) + sign(p_in.x + p_in.y)) u = tan(p_in.x + sign(p_in.y)) v = tan(p_in.y - sign(p_in.x)) z = tan(tan((s * t) + (u * v)) * r) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
